question: If 3x - 7 = 11, what is the value of x?
The compound interest on ₹10,000 at 10% per annum for 2 years is:
If the sum of the interior angles of a polygon is 1260°, how many sides does the polygon have?
The average of five consecutive odd numbers is 35. What is the largest number?
The perimeter of a right-angled triangle is 60 cm and one of the sides is 20 cm. What is the area of the triangle?
If the ratio of the ages of A and B is 4:5 and the sum of their ages is 45, what is A’s age?
A boat goes 16 km downstream in 2 hours and returns upstream in 4 hours. What is the speed of the stream?
If a sum becomes ₹2,400 in 2 years and ₹2,640 in 3 years at simple interest, what is the rate of interest per annum?
